Tuscaloosa.Kaulton, Alabama:
Kaulton is a ghost town formerly located in Tuscaloosa County, Alabama, United States.


== History ==
Kaulton was founded in 1912 to serve as the location for Kaul Lumber Company's new mill after the mill in Hollins closed. John Kaul hired Boston architect George Miller, who laid out plans for the city of Corey, to design Kaulton using Beaux-Arts principles.
